environment_variables.PBS_O_WORKDIR: Directory from which the job was submitted
environment_variables.PBS_NODEFILE: File containing list of cores available to the job
environment_variables.PBS_GPUFILE: File containing list of GPUs available to the job
environment_variables.PBS_NP: Number of cores allocated to the job
environment_variables.HOME: Home directory. Use for permanent files.
environment_variables.WORK: Work directory. Use for fast I/O.
environment_variables.TMPFS: File system set up in memory for this job. Use for very fast, small I/O
environment_variables.TMPDIR: Local disk (hard drive) space set up for this job
